• S01
  • S02

  • 1960

    Klaus and Ben land in Dallas, where he meets a wealthy older woman after being kicked out of a restaurant. With Ben's help, Klaus becomes a cult leader- although he would argue that it's really a spiritual community.

  • 1961

    Allison lands in Dallas, and she finds a safe haven in a salon after being chased by a racist group of men. She later meets her husband, an activist named Raymond Chestnut, in the salon during a civil rights meeting.

  • 1961 TO 1963

    Klaus grows his cult, and he travels to India and San Francisco before returning to Dallas with Ben to see his previous time-traveling love, Dave, before he enlists in the army.

  • 1962

    Luther lands in Dallas, and he begins working for Jack Ruby as his bodyguard and fighter.

    In a separate scene that takes place this year, Reginald Hargreeves and Grace (who would eventually become the model for the robot mother who raises the kids) conduct experiments on Pogo, a chimpanzee that they import to their lab.

  • 1963 SEPT 1

    Diego lands in Dallas and is committed to a mental hospital after he tells people that President Kennedy will be assassinated in the future.

  • 1963 OCT 1

    Vanya lands in Dallas, and is hit by a car driven by a woman named Sissy. She later goes to live with Sissy, her husband Carl, and their son Harlan on their farm outside of Dallas.

  • 1963 NOV

    This when the bulk of the action takes place, and we see the siblings meet back up while also managing their personal lives- Allison and Ray stage a sit-in and she comes clean to him about her powers, Luther continues to work for Jack Ruby, Diego and Lila become romantically involved and he's forced to start working for The Commission, Klaus and Ben manage his cult, and Vanya and Sissy fall in love.

  • 1963 NOV 22

    President Kennedy is killed, but the siblings prevent Vanya from causing the apocalypse (again). Five meets and then sends his older self to 2019, and it's later revealed that the sibling's father is actually an extra terrestrial.

  • 1963 NOV 25

    Five lands in Dallas, and he witnesses another apocalypse. He also sees his siblings try and fail to stop it. He's intercepted by an older version of Hazel, who gives him a briefcase to go back in time (and then is shot dead. RIP Hazel).

  • 1993

    Five kills Lila's parents in London, and The Handler takes Lila and raises her as her own because of her special powers.

  • 1982

    Five travels to Wisconsin to kill the members of the Commission's board. In exchange, he's given a briefcase to travel back to 2019 with his siblings, but he only has 90 minutes to get them all together.

  • 2006

    We finally see Ben's funeral, and it's revealed that he's been walking the Earth with Klaus because he convinced him not to go.

  • 2019 APR 2

    The gang finally lands back in the present-day, and it's confirmed that they prevented the 2019 apocalypse that took place in season one. However, the timeline is not what it was before: The Umbrella Academy is now named The Sparrow Academy, their dad doesn't know who they are, and Ben is alive (and in front of a series of several other silhouetted figures; we have to assume they all have powers too).
